description: Standard table definitions for bridge aggregator protocols that route users across different bridge protocols.

tables.label: Tokens
tables.description: List of tokens supported by the bridge aggregator.

chain_id.description: The blockchain ID where the token resides.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

decimals.description: The decimal places of the token.

tables.label: Token Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of token-level metrics in the aggregator.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots).

chain_id.description: The blockchain ID where the token resides.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

volume_amount.description: The total volume of the token bridged, decimal normalized.

fees.description: The fees collected in token amount, decimal normalized.

incentive_amount.description: The amount of incentives distributed, decimal normalized.

incentive_usd.description: The amount of incentives distributed in USD.

tables.label: Bridge Transactions
tables.description: Transaction-level data for bridge aggregator operations.

source_transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash on the source chain.

destination_transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash on the destination chain.

source_user_address.description: The user's address on the source chain.

destination_user_address.description: The user's address on the destination chain.

input_tokens.description: Array of token addresses used as input.

input_token_amounts.description: Array of input token amounts, decimal normalized.

input_token_fees.description: Array of fees paid in input tokens, decimal normalized.

output_tokens.description: Array of token addresses received as output.

output_token_amounts.description: Array of output token amounts, decimal normalized.
